hackathon-description-text: Dash is a design-hackathon like no other!
hackathon-requirements: Answer all the questions that are presented. The whole team needs to be added!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: EA games for the whole team enough to keep you busy for a while ;)
Space jackets for the whole team!

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
A concept or prototype of a web-platform service that rethinks matchmaking
and provides the user the required tools to develop themselves

The solutions that we’re looking for are especially the ones that can be implemented to the public
healthcare system.

The hoped outcome from this Field of Design is a mobile-platform e-sports game that creates its own
community.

The possible outcome from this Field of Design could be for example a line of products, packages or
something completely different.
Level of Innovation - Aesthetic & uniqueness - Readiness -Process & team work - Return of investment

hackathon-description-header: Dash is a design-hackathon like no other! Come work with designers, developers and business people!
